attributes.action: Paediatric first aid to be given to new and old parents.
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to fund parents new and old who don’t have paediatric first aid to be given a free course to allow all new and old parents to understand all the things we are not told or warned about when we have our children, I as a parent had to go through my child have meningitis and seizures and I knew nothing about it.. I work in child care and a lot of parents don’t know or understand the severity of many things that can happen to their children.
attributes.background: I would like new regardless to how many children they have, new or old parents both mother and father to be given a free 12 hour paediatric first aid course.
